title: Folrian Cabranese Ore
content: Folrian Cabranese Ore is a type of ore used in the Blacksmith profession. It is obtained from a Folrian Cabranese Ore (skill node) using the Miner profession at level 6, or purchased from Bobble's Oresome Ores. It can be used on a Gnome Smelter to receive a Folrian Cabranese Ingot.
